column1: Suvorovskaya (Russian: Суворовская) is a station under construction on the Koltsevaya Line of the Moscow Metro. It will be connected to Dostoyevskaya on the Lyublinsko-Dmitrovskaya Line. The station was deemed to be not economically feasible and construction was cancelled in 2017.
Although there was land cleared for the construction of the station
column2: the city elected not to proceed with development of the station. According to Maksim Vasiliev
column4: construction of the station would be too technically complex
column6: and too costly to compete. Consequently
column7: Vasiliev stated that the station was unlikely to be built.  On August 19
column8: 2019 works on Suvorovskaya station construction site resumed .
